edu.calstatela.sawooope.gamestates.levels

Class LevelInputProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.calstatela.sawooope.gamestates.levels.LevelInputProcessor

  • public class LevelInputProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    LevelInputProcessor keeps track of all touch events and detects what kind of gestures the users is making on the screen( for example: swiping )
    Author:
    Benji

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      class  LevelInputProcessor.TouchAction
      Deprecated. 
      This class will be redesigned due to inconsistent Object-Oriented design, However... it will have to do for now.
      class  LevelInputProcessor.TouchPosition
      ToucPositions are imaginary circles on the screen that represents where the user has pressed.
